ModuleDescription: This module provides an advanced knowledge about the assessment and management of central vestibular disorders, neuro-otological disorders due to migraine and the psychological problems of dizzy patient. This module also describes various rehabilitative management options for patients with vestibular disorders.
Prerequisite: AUD5102: Anatomy & Physiology AUD5103: Pathologies of Auditory System AUD5110: Vestibular Assessment and Management A
